mapper.sql: SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.reserver_name AS reserverName, r.reserver_phone AS reserverPhone, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, r.checkin AS checkin, r.checkout AS checkout, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.stay_nights AS stayNights, r.final_payment_amount AS finalPaymentAmount, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, r.payment_status AS paymentStatus, pr.refund_status AS refundStatus, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pr.payment_id, pr.refund_status FROM payment_refund pr JOIN ( SELECT payment_id, MAX(refund_id) AS max_refund_id FROM payment_refund GROUP BY payment_id ) latest ON latest.payment_id = pr.payment_id AND latest.max_refund_id = pr.refund_id ) pr ON pr.payment_id = p.payment_id

choose.when: ORDER BY r.created_at DESC, r.reservation_id DESC
choose.otherwise: ORDER BY r.checkin ASC, r.checkout ASC, r.reservation_id ASC

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id

SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.reserver_name AS reserverName, r.reserver_phone AS reserverPhone, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, r.checkin AS checkin, r.checkout AS checkout, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.stay_nights AS stayNights, r.final_payment_amount AS finalPaymentAmount, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, r.payment_status AS paymentStatus, pr.refund_status AS refundStatus, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pr.payment_id, pr.refund_status FROM payment_refund pr JOIN ( SELECT payment_id, MAX(refund_id) AS max_refund_id FROM payment_refund GROUP BY payment_id ) latest ON latest.payment_id = pr.payment_id AND latest.max_refund_id = pr.refund_id ) pr ON pr.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostUserId} AND r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
